name: Artwist
description:
Introduction
Game Jam - Memory
You only control one side of your body.
Compete with another to connect the most dots.
What you draw is wiped away like an etch a sketch each round.


Controls
Xbox

Left Axis - Player 1
Right Axis - Player 2
D-Pad - Menu Movement
A Button - Menu Select

Keyboard

A/D - Player 1
Left/Right Arrow - Player 2
Mouse - Menus Interact
